title: Belarus releases 123 political prisoners in deal with US | ABC NEWS
description: Belarusian authorities have released 123 political prisoners in exchange for the lifting of US sanctions on potash. Among those released were Nobel Peace Prize laureate Ales Bialiatski and opposition figure Maria Kolesnikova. The prisoner release was the biggest by Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko since the Trump administration began talks with the authoritarian leader. title: African men lured to Russia for work end up on front lines of Ukraine | ABC NEWS
description: Nearly four years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Moscow is turning to Africa to help bolster its front line. African men have told the ABC they were lured to Russia with the promise of a well-paying job, only to find they had been recruited to serve in its military. Evans Kibet says he was tricked by a recruiter into signing a contract for what he thought was an expenses-paid athletics event. title: As medicinal cannabis approvals surge, regulation sits on the fence | Alan Kohler | ABC NEWS
description: The Australian Medical Association has sounded the alarm on the rapid rise in medicinal cannabis prescriptions in Australia. It's called on the health minister to tighten controls, saying prescribing practices are poorly regulated. Alan Kohler says the ease of access granted by an efficient supply chain has yielded unexpected consequences. title: Wondrous Phoenix cave rises from the ashes of Kangaroo Island bushfires | ABC NEWS
description: In the summer of 2019, bushfires razed nearly half of South Australia's Kangaroo Island. But from the ashes of devastation, a trove of ancient caves was revealed where explorers discovered remarkable features and fauna. The ABC has been given an exclusive first-look at Phoenix cave on South Australia's Kangaroo Island. description: Police are responding to a shooting incident at Bondi Beach in Sydney's east. The public is being urged to avoid the area. Two people have been taken into custody. title: Bondi Beach shooting: at least 10 people dead, including one shooter | ABC NEWS
description: Police media have confirmed to the ABC that 10 people have died in this evening's shooting at Bondi Beach, including one of the shooters and nine victims. Twelve people were also injured, including multiple police officers responding to the incident. A second shooter is among the injured, and is in custody. title: Bondi Beach shooting declared a terrorist incident | ABC NEWS
description: NSW Premier Chris Minns says the Bondi Beach attack was designed to target Sydney's Jewish community on the first day of Hanukkah.  Police say at least 12 people have been killed in a shooting near a Jewish gathering at Sydney's Bondi Beach. One shooter was killed, while another is in custody. title: French tourist describes what he saw when gunmen opened fire at Bondi Beach | ABC NEWS
description: A French-speaking tourist who had only been in Australia two days said he was forced to shelter behind a car with a pregnant woman as the gunman turned his aim toward them. "My coeur [French for "heart"] is dead today," he said. Twelve people, including one of two gunmen, are confirmed dead after a mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach. Another 29 people, including two police officers, are injured and have been taken to hospitals across the city.  #ABCNews  Subscribe: http://ab.co/1svxLVE  ABC NEWS provides around the clock coverage of news events as they break in Australia and abroad.
